keyword: how many calories in half a cucumber
title: How Many Calories in Half a Cucumber?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in half a cucumber, including carbs, fiber, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Half a Cucumber?
assumptions: Raw, unpeeled, medium cucumber (300 g whole), fresh; half is ~150 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, freshness, and preparation; check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: Half a medium cucumber provides about 24 kcal, low in calories with good hydration and fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Sliced in salad with vinaigrette (1 tsp oil)

faqs.q: How many calories in half a cucumber?
faqs.a: About 24 kcal for half a medium raw cucumber.

faqs.q: Is half a cucumber low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, ~5.4 g carbs, with 1.5 g fiber, making it keto-friendly.

faqs.q: What nutrients are in half a cucumber besides calories?
faqs.a: Provides 1.1 g protein, 0.2 g fat, vitamins K and C, and hydration from 95% water.

faqs.q: Does peeling a cucumber change calories?
faqs.a: Slightly; peeling reduces calories minimally (~2 kcal less) but lowers fiber.

faqs.q: How much fiber in half a cucumber?
faqs.a: Approximately 1.5 g dietary fiber, aiding digestion.
